title: arguments against a non unanimous early ff + ffs in general
body:
i really dont understand how people are so adamant about being anti surrender, im gonna preface this by saying **i dont think ranked should at all have an ff vote and none of this applies to ranked matches **

i always hear "stay in losing matches to improve" but lets be real for a second, how the game is rn you usually arent learning from losing matches because they're too far gone often than not, would it not be better to start a new match from scratch and improve from there instead of being trapped in a one-shot fest? imo the way the game is now losing isnt a learning experience unless its a long match that ends up lost, a pure shit stomp has nothing of value for you to learn after it starts when all you needed to learn from that point was mistakes you made that lead to that point 

another thing i hear is that "every game is winnable" i think everyone knows most games can be brought back, but keep in mind this is a game ment for fun, if most of the team agrees to ff it usually means that even if its kinda winnable no one wants to play it out because its just not gonna be fun, uphill battles arent fun for most people in norms, winning at the cost of a long frustrating match just isnt worth the hassle for a lot of people and can easily ruin your next match because your tilted from the last match even harder than you would be if you coulda just ended it at 15 and got into a good match after not to mention that those hard losses that are pulled back are just way too rare and your usually just gonna end up wasting more time on a loss with no payout 

if theres anything i missed or any counterpoints you want me to rebut just leave a comment 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body:
"Every game is winnable" is the most nonsensical hypothetical response I've ever heard used in these debates and almost never actually applies. "Every game is winnable" because the enemy team could spontaneously fall into a coma irl giving you opportunity to win while they're 500% AFK. 

THAT is why "every game is winnable" and THAT is why the argument is bullshit.

Let's be real, here:

* Not every game has a realistic win condition
* Not every team can be carried
* Not every game is solo carryable
* Not every player deserves to win
* Not every team deserves to lose

Time is humanity's most precious commodity. If you are wasting time, you are wasting life. There is no reason to waste your life on something that will not benefit you, such as up to 20 more minutes of a losing game. 

The game I just played was a stomp from start to finish yet the enemy team wouldn't FF. It ended with a score of 52 to 28 with a 10k gold advantage, every dragon, every tower on their side taken, in about 35 minutes and a TANK with NO DAMAGE ITEMS hyper-carrying. That, to me, is not a game that should've been pushed beyond the 20 minute mark. People need to stop clinging to their damaged pride and just FF when a game is hopeless. "Hey they might decide to quit or just keel over!" is not hope, it's delusion. In the time the game took after the early surrender point, a new game could've been started that they could've won by the time this one finished.

2 games come in mind when I was playing where I was extremely fed 18+ Kills but the rest of my team was doing trash. We could win the game if people played around me, but they surrendered 4 to 1. Just because you are doing trash why should we feel the need to surrender? so many games where I have had an epic comeback or the game turned around. The problem with a lot of people in this game is where they "think" the game is lost and play like trash because they "feel" the game is over already and then are not playing to the best of their abilities. If you want to play league learn to play it all the way through otherwise go play a solo game where you can quit at anytime thanks.

I play to play the game and have fun. you want to actually win? go do ranked. there are many more players like you in ranked. blind has absolutely no risk or reward for winning or losing. so there is no reason to cry and surrender when 4 out of 5 enemies are fed to hell and back. like it or not, losing is part of EVERY game. if you can't handle losing then don't play this game, or any game for that matter. it is not the end of the world nor the end of your life if you lose. it is just a game. people need to grow up and learn to lose games. if you wanna make a big deal out of winning and losing then go do ranked where it actually means something. so again, no reason to surrender/give up (which do mean the same).
